thread.title: Apple Could Pay Up To $862 Million After Losing Patent Lawsuit

title: Apple Could Pay Up To $862 Million After Losing Patent Lawsuit
text:
Published By: Forbes.com: Technology - Today 
A U.S. jury has ruled Apple used technology owned by the University of Wisconsin to create more efficient chips....
